page.title: 10WILLOWCROFT HOME,SALISBURY
page.content: The accomodation is for 64 old people given 1 room each of their own. They can come and go. They are given three meals a day. There is a large lounge area with a television. There are 50 employees, mainly senior staff, but some junior & volunteers. There are very few regulations for the people or for visitors. The Â£7 pocket money is either to save or to spend. The old people mainly come from the Salisbury area. They pay a minimum fee of Â£32 yearly & a maximum of Â£100. This depends on how much money they have, or how wealthy their families are. Some of the old people need operations, in which case they go to Newbridge hospital.
